title: 3 opportunities from the Balkan Museum Network!
content:
We are happy to share three great opportunities from the Balkan Museum Network for cultural heritage professionals, researchers, and practitioners.

 

1 â€“ Call for Webinar Contributors

Cultural heritage faces growing challenges, but inspiring initiatives are already making a difference. Heritage professionals, organizations, and community initiatives are invited to share proven practices that protect heritage, build capacity, and engage communities. Selected contributors will present their work in the upcoming webinar series and exchange knowledge with peers across the sector.
Deadline to apply: 10 MarchðŸª„ â€“> Apply
